description: The planet #planet##nameOrigin#is #planetType.a# planet in #solarSystem# #fiveToTen# other planets. #planet# is about #multiplier# times bigger than Earth and its gravity is about #multiplier# times that of Earth. A single day lasts #hours# hours and a year lasts #names9# days. The planet is made up of #continents# continents, which make up #landmass#% of the planet's landmass. #moons# moon(s) orbit the planet and #planet# itself orbits ai #starColor# sun in #orbitType.a#.
